rst you must have a proper body, and I shall craft and form it myself. COme=
, it will not do for you to remain so unguarded such as you are," the Decep=
ticon stated, raising his arm to guide the spark back to the medical bay. A=
t this stage he could easily modify the intermediate body already under con=
struction to something she would like.
> > =A0
> > "It has been a long time=
 since I had someone near I could trust," he stated, accessing the console =
and began actively changing the sparkless body to what would be the physica=
l manifestation of the spark.

> 
> The fiery spark followed him t=
o the Med Bay. Amazing how it could last so long without a form but there w=
as a determination, something unique about this spark. 
> 
> In the med bay=
... the form - nothing more than a jumbled mess of metal and parts - was co=
ming along well enough. The spark hovered over the form as though inspectin=
g it. Silent for now as speaking took so much energy; drawing that energy f=
rom it's surroundings in order to manifest. 
> As it hovered over the face,=
 distorted and incomplete, like a human skull without skin or muscle. A sli=
ght movement and the spark shifted to hover over the torso before it shot i=
nto and disappearing into the torso. A humming pulse as a bright glow emina=
ted from the upper torso of the incomplete form. 
> 
> She awaited for the =
new body to be completed. Ready for action, ready for life. The crimson opt=
ics flashed somewhat then pulsed. The vocalizer attempted to warm up as it =
attempted to speak. The crimson optics glowed brightly and then remained st=
eadily glowing, and finally... she spoke. 
"Uaahhhh," she sighed as though =
breathless, "I thank you." her volcalizer reverberated the voice that was e=
ver so familiar. A deep femme's voice in a wry sultry malicious tone. It wa=
s the trademark voice of Maxima. 
"For so long have I sought to restore my =
spark to a proper body fit for a Decepticon," her words expressed in almost=
 a slurred speech, as though exhausted. But she was able to speak nonethele=
ss.
